mapper.select: SELECT CRE_SEQ ,DATE_FORMAT(STRT_SCHD_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') AS STRT_SCHD_YMD ,DATE_FORMAT(END_SCHD_YMD,'%Y-%m-%d') AS END_SCHD_YMD ,TIT ,CONT ,DATE_FORMAT(CRE_DAT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CRE_DAT FROM SCHD_BAS WHERE CONVERT(#{SEARCH_DATE},DATE) BETWEEN STRT_SCHD_YMD AND END_SCHD_YMD AND MEMB_ID = #{MEMB_ID}
